movies.title: Eternals
movies.description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.description: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

movies.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
movies.description: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

movies.title: Red Notice
movies.description: In the world of international crime, an Interpol agent attempts to hunt down and capture the world's most wanted art thief.

movies.title: The Addams Family 2
movies.description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters.

movies.title: Sing 2
movies.description: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO. This complex journey into the subconscious is a groundbreaking tale of intrigue and revelation.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college. It's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he faces lawsuits by those who claim he stole their idea, and his co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.description: Nina, a talented but unstable ballet dancer, competes for the lead in 'Swan Lake,' a role that requires her to embody both the pure White Swan and the sinister Black Swan. As the pressures mount, Nina's grip on reality begins to slip, leading to a descent into madness.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: In this psychological thriller directed by Martin Scorsese, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is assigned to investigate the disappearance of a patient from Boston's Shutter Island Ashecliffe Hospital. He uncovers shocking truths about the place and his own unresolved past.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.description: This animated adventure film tells the story of a young Viking named Hiccup who aspires to follow his tribe's tradition of becoming a dragon slayer. After capturing his first dragon, he realizes that there is more to these creatures than he assumed.

movies.title: Kick-Ass
movies.description: Directed by Matthew Vaughn, 'Kick-Ass' is a superhero black comedy based on the comic book of the same name. It tells the story of an ordinary teenager, Dave Lizewski, who sets out to become a real-life superhero, calling himself 'Kick-Ass'.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.description: A whimsical adventure as Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood, embarking on a journey to find her true destiny.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: Tony Stark faces pressure from the government, the press, and the public to share his technology with the military, while also tackling new enemies.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.description: A supervillain named Gru plans the biggest heist in the history of the world: to steal the moon. However, his plans are altered by three orphaned girls.

movies.title: Bad Boys for Life
movies.description: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

movies.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
movies.description: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

movies.title: Birds of Prey
movies.description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

movies.title: Dolittle
movies.description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

movies.title: The Invisible Man
movies.description: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
During World War I, two British soldiers are sent to deliver an urgent message to an isolated regiment. If the message is not received in time, the regiment will walk into a trap and be massacred.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a formidable conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Incredibles 2
movies.description: Helen is called on to lead a campaign to bring Supers back, while Bob navigates the day-to-day heroics of "normal" life at home with Violet, Dash, and baby Jack-Jack—whose superpowers are about to be discovered.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering unease about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress meet and fall in love in Los Angeles, navigating the joys and pains of pursuing their dreams.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

movies.title: Drive
movies.description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

movies.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
movies.description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

movies.title: Warrior
movies.description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

movies.title: Moneyball
movies.description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

movies.title: The Help
movies.description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

movies.title: The Artist
movies.description: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

movies.title: Midnight in Paris
movies.description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

movies.title: Hugo
movies.description: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

movies.title: Rango
movies.description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

movies.title: The Descendants
movies.description: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

shows.title: The Explosion Show
shows.description: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces to get him back.

shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to create and sell the purest methamphetamine.

shows.title: The Crown
shows.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

shows.title: The Mandalorian
shows.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

shows.title: Friends
shows.description: Follows the lives, relationships, and comedic mishaps of six friends living in New York City.

shows.title: Rick and Morty
shows.description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

shows.title: The Office (US)
shows.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

shows.title: The Sopranos
shows.description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

shows.title: Game of Thrones
shows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

shows.title: The Simpsons
shows.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

shows.title: Sherlock
shows.description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

shows.title: The Witcher
shows.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

shows.title: The Walking Dead
shows.description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

shows.title: The Big Bang Theory
shows.description: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

shows.title: Doctor Who
shows.description: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

shows.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
shows.description: Follows the hilarious misadventures of the detectives of the 99th precinct of the New York City Police Department in Brooklyn.

shows.title: Black Mirror
shows.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

shows.title: Narcos
shows.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

shows.title: The Haunting of Hill House
shows.description: A modern reimagining of Shirley Jackson's classic novel about five siblings who grew up in the most famous haunted house in America.

shows.title: The Queen's Gambit
shows.description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA.

shows.title: Peaky Blinders
shows.description: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England, and centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

shows.title: The Handmaid's Tale
shows.description: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

shows.title: Dark
shows.description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

shows.title: The Umbrella Academy
shows.description: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

shows.title: Westworld
shows.description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

shows.title: The Expanse
shows.description: A police detective in the asteroid belt, the first officer of an interplanetary ice freighter, and an earth-bound United Nations executive slowly discover a vast conspiracy that threatens the Earth's rebellious colony on the asteroid belt.

shows.title: Fargo
shows.description: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

shows.title: Mindhunter
shows.description: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.
